panels.description: The setting wal_buffers defines how much memory is used for caching the write-ahead log entries. Generally this value is small (3% of shared_buffers value), but it may need to be modified for heavily loaded servers.
panels.title: Total Disk-Page Buffers

panels.description: The parameter work_mem defines the amount of memory assigned for internal sort operations and hash tables before writing to temporary disk files.  The default is 4MB.
panels.title: Total Memory Size for each Sort

panels.description: Defines the amount of memory the database server uses for shared memory buffers.  Default is 128MB.  Guidance on tuning is 25% of RAM, but generally doesn't exceed 40%.
panels.title: Total Shared Buffers

panels.description: Whether autovacuum process is enabled or not.  Generally the solution is to vacuum more often, not less.
panels.title: Services Autovacuum

targets.expr:
sum by (service_name) (avg by (service_name) (max_over_time(pg_stat_activity_count{service_name=~"$service_name",state=~'idle'}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(pg_stat_activity_count{service_name=~"$service_name",state='idle'}[5m]))) / on (service_name)
avg by (service_name) ((max_over_time(pg_settings_max_connections{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(pg_settings_max_connections{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m])))

sum by (service_name) (avg by (service_name) (max_over_time(pg_stat_activity_count{service_name=~"$service_name",state='active',datname!~"template.*|postgres"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(pg_stat_activity_count{service_name=~"$service_name",state='active',datname!~"template.*|postgres"}[5m]))) / on (service_name) avg by (service_name) ((max_over_time(pg_settings_max_connections{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(pg_settings_max_connections{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m])))

sum((sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_deadlock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_deadlock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_lock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_lock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_snapshot{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_snapshot{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_tablespace{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_tablespace{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))))

topk(5,((sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_deadlock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_deadlock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_lock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_lock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_snapshot{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_snapshot{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_tablespace{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_tablespace{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m])))))

avg((sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_deadlock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_deadlock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_lock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_lock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_snapshot{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_snapshot{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_tablespace{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_tablespace{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))))

(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_deadlock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_deadlock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +
(sum by (service_name) (rate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_lock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval])) or
sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_lock{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +

sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_snapshot{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))) +

sum by (service_name) (irate(pg_stat_database_conflicts_confl_tablespace{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m])))
